title: Textile, 1920s
medium:
Medium: printed cotton
Technique: polychrome block print on cotton
description: Patterned by large diamonds geometrically formed from polychrome triangles in dark blue, purple, dark red, black (shaded hues of each color). In the center of the diamond shape is a large abstract lavender flower with green leaves.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920s.
1920s. Medium: printed cotton
Technique: polychrome block print on cotton. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-111.
